dataType.name: ANY
dataType.represents: blob boolean code complex date datetime decimal duration identifier ordinal quantity string text count

flavor.name: CS.LANG
flavor.operationalization: The language is compliant to RFC 3066 (Tags for the Identification of Languages ). The format for the language to describe is ss [-CC] where ss stands for the language tag, according to ISO 639-1 and CC for the optional country code, ISO-3166 alpha-2. The resulting language indicator is not case sensitive.

dataType.name: QTY
dataType.represents: complex date datetime decimal duration ordinal quantity count

dataType.name: PQ
dataType.represents: complex decimal duration ordinal quantity count

dataType.name: BXIT_IVL_PQ
dataType.desc: BAG of Interval of Physical Quantities

dataType.name: SXCM_TS
dataType.represents: complex code date datetime duration quantity

dataType.name: SXPR_TS
dataType.desc: Parenthetic Set Expression of Time Stamp

flavor.name: TS.DATE
flavor.operationalization: May only contain a date value YYYYMMDD (or YYYYMM or YYYY)

flavor.name: TS.DATE.FULL
flavor.operationalization: Shall contain reference to a particular day
